DOC.brief_summary: To assess PF-04958242 attenuate ketamine-induced cognitive impairment verbal learning memory , episodic memory spatial work memory healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Examine The Effects Of PF-04958242 On Ketamine-Induced Cognitive Impairment In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject 21 45 year old . Able read write English primary language . Subjects willing comply study procedure . History substance abuse dependence disorder meeting DSMIV criterion and/or SCIDNP within past 12 month , exception nicotine . Known sensitivity ketamine Any history DSMIV Axis I psychiatric disorder , determine SCIDNP interview diagnose view investigator .
